Summary

Table of Contents

  • Pods
  • Backs moves
  • Open play

A summary of the key words and phrases used in attacking play.

Pods

Lead (1) The expected ball carrier at the front of the pod, closest to the 9/10
Link (2) The outside tip option
Pull (3) The â€œout the backâ€ option
Release Pass from the forwards to a supporting back
Take off Pass behind the pod to a supporting back
Joker A pick and go (x3)
Ace A short punch off 9 (a very narrow King pod)
King A pod running off 9
Queen A pod running off 10

Backs moves

(Blocker)		 10 has passing option to 13 running hard and 12 out the back

(Box 1)		 Blind side winger offering 10 an out-the-back option behind a hard running centre.

(Box 2)		 Same as Scotland, but run off 12, with 13 on the hard line.
ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· France 10 and the blind winger coming across to take the ball from 12, behind 13

ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡· Argentina 10 miss pass to 13, passing back inside to 12, or the blind side winger cutting across

Open play

Stick (formerly Ace) Box kick from 9
Twist (formerly Jack) Clearance kick from 10
Ireland Cross-field kick
Flash Get ball directly to the 10 (space out wide)
Tango Change direction of play
Bang Hit a one-off runner in space (override call)
Face Miss pass (in front)
Tails Miss pass (behind)
